mapper.select: SELECT m.id , m.name , IFNULL(m.birthDt, '') birthDt , d.degree FROM member m JOIN degree d ON m.degreeFk = d.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%');
SELECT id , degree FROM degree ORDER BY CAST(id AS UNSIGNED) DESC;

SELECT CONCAT(m.name, IFNULL(SUBSTRING(m.birthDt, 3, 2), '')) name , l.level , l.color , d.degree , CASE WHEN a.grade = 60 THEN '회원' WHEN a.grade = 50 THEN '회원' WHEN a.grade = 40 THEN '매니저' WHEN a.grade = 30 THEN '운영진' WHEN a.grade = 20 THEN '부회장' WHEN a.grade = 10 THEN '회장' ELSE '회원' END grade FROM member m JOIN level l ON m.levelFK = l.id JOIN degree d ON m.degreeFK = d.id LEFT JOIN admin a ON m.id = a.memberFK WHERE m.id != 'TCN0' AND m.id = #{id}

SELECT me.id , me.name meetingName , me.hostDt , me.time , me.criticalMeetingYn , m2.name hostName , c.name climbingAreaName , c.winwinYn FROM member m1 JOIN attend a ON m1.id = a.memberFK JOIN meeting me ON a.meetingFK = me.id JOIN climbingArea c ON me.climbingAreaFK = c.id JOIN admin ad ON me.adminFK = ad.id JOIN member m2 ON ad.memberFK = m2.id WHERE m1.id != 'TCN0' AND me.meetingStatusFK = '10' AND m.id = #{id} AND YEAR(me.hostDt) = #{hostDt} ORDER BY MONTH(me.hostDt), me.hostDt
